text: Hagaamuina Dimaadua go doo God! Mee gu hagagila aga dono manawa tenetene adu gi di goe i dana dugu goe di king, e dagi i lala dono ingoo. Mai i dono aloho i ana daangada digau Israel mo dono hiihai e daahi digaula gi noho hua beelaa, Mee guu dugu goe di nadau king belee madamada humalia nnaganoho mo di tonu.”
